title: Award

title: Santa Jim Yelllig's Glasses and Belt Pin
description: The glasses that famous Santa Claus, Indiana Santa impersonator, Jim Yellig, wore as he portrayed the character and the belt pin that would keep his belt attached.
creator: Yellig, Jim

description: A souvenir fabric patch with Santa's face on it from Santa Claus Land.

description: A ticket to Santa Claus Land for Southwestern Indiana Teachers.

title: "Santa Claus Land"

description: A souvenir creamer pitcher for Santa Claus Land.

title: Christmas Stamp Dedication Program
description: Program that reads: "United States 1963 Christmas Stamp Dedication Ceremony Santa Claus, Indiana November 1, 1963"

title: Newspaper Article
description: Newspaper article clipping that reads: "Christmas Lake Village The Village Herald Vol.3 No.2"
creator: The Village Herald

title: December 1935 Dear Santa Letter from Robinson
description: Dear Santa Letter written by 8 year old Mary Jane Robinson of Akron, Ohio asking for a rubber dolly that "wets its pants," and shares a story with Santa of a little girl who did not believe and woke up to ash and sticks for Christmas.
creator: Robinson, Mary Jane

title: November 1940 Dear Santa Letter from Boganski
description: Dear Santa Letter written by 6 year old Rita Boganski of Chicago, Illinois asking for a gift for herself but also every member of her family and even a "little boy from upstairs."
creator: Boganski, Rita Ann

title: December 1943 Dear Santa Letter No Name
description: Dear Santa Letter that takes a more artistic approach from Oak Park, Illinois - name and age of the young artist is currently unknown.
creator: Unknown

title: December 1948 Dear Santa Letter from Friedley
description: Dear Santa Letter written by 5 year old Mary Ann Friedley of Sandusky, Ohio who had her father's helping asking Santa for a new doll with blonde hair and various items to make the doll's life comfortable and she let's Santa know that she will make a pot of coffee to go with her sister's lunch.
creator: Friedley, Mary Ann

title: December 1948 Dear Santa Letter from Smous
description: Dear Santa Letter letter written by Gary Smous of South Bend, Indiana asking for a football, some socks (size 9 1/2), and a carrom board - attached is also a pencil drawing of a house with stars.
creator: Smous, Gary

title: December 1948 Dear Santa Letter from Mildon
description: Dear Santa Letter written by 7 year old Robin Mildon of Barnstaple, Devon (England) who has only two things on their list.
creator: Mildon, Robin

title: December 1949 Dear Santa Letter from Mitchell
description: Dear Santa Letter written by Robert Mitchell of New York City thanking Santa for last year's presents and letting him know what he would like this year.
location: New York City, New York, USA
creator: Mitchell, Robert

title: December 1949 Dear Santa Letter from Auxter
description: Dear Santa Letter written by young Marcella Auxter of Fremont, Ohio who has "been a good girl" and would like a new baton and record player to name few items.
creator: Auxter, Marcella

title: Dear Santa Letter from Johannesburg
description: Dear Santa Letter from some children at the Southdale Library in Johannesburg, South Africa who have decided to draw a picture of what they would like from Santa this year.
creator: n/a

title: Dear Santa Letter from Germany
description: Dear Santa Letter written in German.
creator: Kreusig, Brumhilde

title: November 1935 Dear Santa Letter from Gloria B.
description: Dear Santa Letter written by Gloria B. of Detroit, Michigan who uses blue crayon to ask Santa for a Shirley Temple doll.
creator: B., Gloria

title: November 1935 Dear Santa Letter from Eggleston
description: Dear Santa Letter by Arnold Eggleston who clearly states what he would like for Christmas.
creator: Eggleston, Arnold

title: December 1949 Dear Santa Letter from Kleist
description: Dear Santa Letter written by Donna Jean Kleist of Fox Lake, Illinois who asks for a stove, ice box, and a sink at the top of her list.
creator: Kleist, Donna Jean
